name: Dungeon Runner (itch) (Chamelian)
description:
RNG based game where you run and dodge spikes. You can't stop moving or else you will be crushed by the wall. A short game created because of a 24 hour game jam.

Links:

Youtbe - Youtube Channel

Twitter - Twitter

Scratch - -Chamelian-

Not for Mobile users currently

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Arrows - Move

> - Right

< - Left

^ - Jump

v - Slide

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
